<div style="height: 1.2rem;"></div>



The main **objectives** of CIRCE are:

- to enhance collaboration among Italian researchers interested in Extreme Value Theory;
- to support early-career researchers through networking and collaborative opportunities;
- to promote italian research in extreme value statistics at the international level.

<div style="height: 1.2rem;"></div>

CIRCE promotes and coordinates a variety of **scientific activities**:

- periodic workshops and meetings;
- seminars and thematic sessions (also online);
- collaborative research initiatives and informal working groups;
- organization of conference sessions related to extreme value modeling;
- sharing of resources, references, and teaching material.
